course_description: This course focuses on professional and historical issues relating to nurse anesthesia education and practice.  Legal issues, standards of care, scope of practice and variations between states will be examined.  Optimization of and challenges to wellness and work/life balance will be explored.
prerequisites: NRSG 688 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4346, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 10a-12p, Instructor: K. Wiltse Nicely, Status: Closed
